txt.en: A raiding party of Orcs has descended upon the Folde Farm. You should defend the inhabitants.
Orcs threaten to ruin crops and injure the farmers at Folde Farm.\n\nYou should defeat the Orcs and prevent them from destroying the farm.
After you alerted the Folde Farm of the potential danger, a raiding party of Orcs descended upon the farm.
The Orcs at the Folde Farm have been defeated; however, the possibility of another assault still looms.
